meeting_info.organization: City Council Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion
Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care and Empowerment
Liz Cedillo-Pereira, Assistant City Manager, City of Dallas
Holly Holt, Assistant Director, Office of Community Care and Empowerment
Christopher Graves, Human Rights Officer, Office of Equity and Inclusion
participants: Carlos Evans, Director, Environmental Quality and Sustainability
Heather Lowe, Interim Director, Dallas Public Library
John D. Jenkins, Director, Parks and Recreation
Martine Elyse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture

agenda_items.title: Approval of the September 9, 2024, Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Closing Disparities: Department Progress Measures Update - Vibrant Portfolio
agenda_items.description: Update on progress measures related to closing disparities across various departments.

agenda_items.title: October 2024 Upskilling Pilot Program Update and Next Steps
agenda_items.description: Update on the Upskilling Pilot Program and its objectives.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Dallas Youth Survey and Dallas Youth Collaborative Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Dallas Youth Survey and collaborative efforts to engage youth.

agenda_items.title: Martin Luther King Jr. Parade Week Update
agenda_items.description: Planning update for the upcoming Martin Luther King Jr. Celebration Week.

agenda_items.title: Human Rights Taskforce Workshop Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the planning and focus areas for the Human Rights Workshop.

agenda_items.title: Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items for the committee.
